Sentencas: Nickel-yttria stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) cermet is widely used as an anode material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Preparation of nickel coated YSZ powder for application as an anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: While the nickel-to-nickel chain maintains the electrical conductivity path, the YSZ contributes to lowering the thermal expansion and inhibits nickel coarsening during high temperature (100 degreesC) operation.
Titulo: Preparation of nickel coated YSZ powder for application as an anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An electroless technique is employed to prepare a uniform nickel coating on the YSZ powder.
Titulo: Preparation of nickel coated YSZ powder for application as an anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The process parameters for this technique are optimized.
Titulo: Preparation of nickel coated YSZ powder for application as an anode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Notably, the cermet thus prepared shows percolation at a much lower nickel content (10-20 vol.%) compared with those reported in the literature.
Titulo: Preparation of nickel coated YSZ powder for application as an anode for solid oxide fuel cells
Preparation of nickel coated YSZ powder for application as an anode for solid oxide fuel cells
